Start here: Getting Started See the Release History ‚Üê Warning Request ‚Üí  mount_gradio_app gradio.mount_gradio_app(¬∑¬∑¬∑) Description Mount a gradio.Blocks to an existing FastAPI application.  Example Usage from fastapi import FastAPI
import gradio as gr
app = FastAPI()
@app.get("/")
def read_main():
    return {"message": "This is your main app"}
io = gr.Interface(lambda x: "Hello, " + x + "!", "textbox", "textbox")
app = gr.mount_gradio_app(app, io, path="/gradio") Then run uvicorn run:app from the terminal and navigate to http://localhost:8000/gradio. Initialization Parameters ‚ñº   ‚Üê Warning Request ‚Üí     Status
